skillTree.localised_description: The large, broad steeds favoured by the Knights and nobles of the Empire have a temperament to match their size.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

skillTree.localised_description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: His role is to uphold the Emperor's Justice during trials of combat, which are the judicial right of all high-ranking nobles accused of breaking one of the Emperor's laws. Such is Ludwig's deadly reputation that many accused nobleman have confessed their guilt before a sword has even been drawn.
The incident with the von Raukove family was an infamous tale which in some ways haunts the reputation of Ludwig, yet also strengthens his image as the Emperor's Justice.

effects.description: Attribute : Fear against the Forces of Destruction
Attribute : Rampage against the Forces of Destruction

skillTree.localised_description: When the Emperor travels the land, it is with the unsmiling Ludwig at his side, and Karl Franz's diplomatic words are often backed up by the silent yet ever-present threat of his Champion's keen blade. In battle, the Emperor's Champion rallies the Empire army to Karl Franz's banner, and takes on the role of his bodyguard, saving his lord's life on more than one occasion.

"There is much wrong in the way that the Empire runs itself, Bloch. Many who rule do not deserve to. Many who are ruled could make a better fist of it. You’re a fighting man. You’ve seen armies commanded by fools and good men led into ruin by them. But there’s opportunity in battle. Mettle will always show itself. There are men in the Empire who know how to reward talent and how to ignore low birth. The Emperor, Sigmar keep him, is one. It is to him I owe my station, not to my breeding. And so it is with me. I need good men around me. I’d like you to be one of them." 
	—Ludwig Schwarzhelm, Emperor's Sword of Justice

effects.description: Upkeep: -50% while embedded in Karl Franz's army

Upkeep: -10% for Halberdier and Spearmen units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +5 for State Troops units and Empire Captains
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +5 for State Troops units and Empire Captains
	(all units in army)
Grants Schwarzhelm Markus Bloch, decorated Halberdier officer as a follower

Bonus vs Large: +6 for Spearmen and Halberdiers units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: In addition to his formidable skills as a master swordsman, Ludwig also acts as a potent reminder of the Emperor's authority, travelling to various provincial capitals to ensure that Imperial Edicts are being obeyed. Karl Franz has an unyielding sense of fairness and honour, and he does not look kindly upon those lords who flaunt their wealth whilst their populace languishes in abject poverty.

effects.description: Grants Schwarzhelm  Heinrich Lassus, retired Imperial General and Swordmaster as a follower

Melee defence: +8 for Lords and embedded Heroes
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "You have come too soon, Beast of Chaos. This blade has drunk deep of your kin's blood before. It will do so again. You know its power. Look on it, horror of the void, and know despair!"

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

items.colour_text: The Sword of Justice is encrusted with ancient Dwarf runes, granting it unmatched accuracy and deadly retribution. Passed down from Champion to Champion through the reigns of successive Emperors, this weapon is not only an instrument of battle, but also a symbol of loyalty, skill, and a further example of the long-standing friendship between the Dwarfs and Humans.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

items.colour_text: Ludwig Schwarzhelm is entrusted to carry one of the Emperor's personnal banners. This magnificent standard has been wrought with subtle magic so that hearts of all true soldiers of the Empire who gaze upon it are filled with courage.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Ludwig Schwarzhelm, known as the Emperor's Champion or the Emperor's Sword of Justice is the personal bodyguard of Karl Franz and bearer of his personal battle standard. Ludwig is a towering figure of a man, renowned throughout the Empire for his mighty physique, stern expression and deadly martial skills.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero
